00030         enum ExperimentTimerType //The type of a experiment timer, used for logging(flags, combinations possible)
00031         {
00032                 Experiment_Timer_None           = 0,
00033                 Experiment_Timer_Experiment     = 1,
00034                 Experiment_Timer_Frame          = 2
00035                 //Experiment_Timer_Experiment   = 4,
00036                 //Experiment_Timer_Experiment   = 8,
00037                 //Experiment_Timer_Experiment   = 16,
00038                 //Experiment_Timer_Experiment   = 32
00039         };
00040 
00044         enum ExperimentSubObjectState
00045         {       
00046                 Experiment_SubObject_Constructing       = 0, 
00047                 Experiment_SubObject_Initialized        = 1, 
00048                 Experiment_SubObject_Started            = 2, 
00049                 Experiment_SubObject_Abort                      = 3, 
00050                 Experiment_SubObject_IsAborting         = 4, 
00051                 Experiment_SubObject_Stop                       = 5, 
00052                 Experiment_SubObject_IsStopping         = 6, 
00053                 Experiment_SubObject_Stopped            = 7, 
00054                 Experiment_SubObject_Destructing        = 8, 
00055                 Experiment_SubObject_MaxState           = 9  
00056         };
00057

00060                 EXML_Declarations,
00061                 EXML_Actions,
00062                 EXML_Object,
00063                 EXML_Event
00064         };

00069                 int minor;

00072         };

00074         typedef struct strcExperimentConfiguration
00075         {
00076                 int nExperimentID;
00077                 //int nExperimentNumber;
00078                 QString nExperimentName;
00079                 bool bDebugMode;
00080                 ExperimentManager *pExperimentManager;
00081         } ExperimentConfiguration;
00082 
00083         typedef struct strcExperimentSubObjectStateHistory
00084         {
00085                 QList<ExperimentManagerNameSpace::ExperimentSubObjectState> nState;
00086                 QList<QString> sDateTimeStamp;
00087         } ExperimentSubObjectStateHistory;
00088 
00089         typedef struct strcTrialStructure
00090         {
00091                 int nTrialID;
00092                 int nTrialNumber;
00093                 //QString nBlockName;
00094                 int nNrOfInternalTriggers;
00095                 int nNrOfExternalSubTriggers;//Normally this is 1 which means that each ExternalSubTrigger is valid for 1 InternalTrigger, eg 3 means that only after 3 ExternalSubTriggers 1 InternalTriggers is processed!
00096                 //RandomGenerator *randEmptyStimGenerator;//This can hold some trial specific Information that can also be randomized
00097         } TrialStructure;
00098 
00099         typedef struct strcBlockTrialStructure
00100         {
00101                 int nBlockID;
00102                 int nBlockNumber;
00103                 QString nBlockName;
00104                 int nNrOfTrials;
00105                 QList<TrialStructure> lTrialStructure;
00106         } BlockTrialStructure;
00107 
00108         typedef struct strcExperimentBlockTrialStructure
00109         {
00110                 //int nExperimentID??
00111                 //int nExperimentName??
00112                 int nNrOfBlocks;
00113                 QList<BlockTrialStructure> lBlockTrialStructure;
00114         } ExperimentBlockTrialStructure;
00115 
00116         typedef struct strcExperimentSnapshotStructure
00117         {
00118                 int currExpBlockTrialFrame;
00119                 int currExpExternalTrigger;                     //The current experiment external trigger
00120                 int currExpInternalTrigger;                     //The current experiment internal trigger
00121                 int currExpBlockTrialTrigger;           //This is different!! It is now the current trigger within a Block Trial
00122                 int currExpTrial;                                       //The current experiment trial within the block         
00123                 int currExpBlock;                                       //The current experiment block
00124                 int currExpBlockTrialInternalTriggerAmount;
00125                 double elapsedTrialTime;
00126                 //int currExpBlockTrialCycle;--> inside widget
00127         } ExperimentSnapshotStructure;
00128 
00129         //The following structure looks like the ExperimentSnapshotStructure, but this structure should NOT be used internally by the Experiment Manager but only by the script context!
00130         //It's sole purpose is to support an easy way to automatically step trough (and buffer) the Experiment Structure just before a new ExternalTriggerIncremented() signal is emitted,
00131         //It Allows the script then to fetch the correct structure using the getExperimentStructure() slot!
00135         typedef struct strcScriptExperimentStructure
00136         {
00137                 int currExpAbsExternalTrigger;                          
00138                 int currExpAbsInternalTrigger;                          
00139                 int currExpBlockTrialRelInternalTrigger;        
00140                 int currExpTrial;                                                       
00141                 int currExpBlock;                                                       
00142         } ScriptExperimentStructure;
00143 
00144         typedef struct strcExperimentSnapshotFullStructure
00145         {
00146                 ExperimentSnapshotStructure parentStruct;
00147                 int nTotalProcessedExperimentTrials;            //The total number of trials processed within experiment, might be that this Trial is not fully processed
00148                 int nNextThresholdTriggerCount;                         //When we should switch to the next block
00149         } ExperimentSnapshotFullStructure;
00150 
00154         struct strcParsedParameterDefinition
00155         {
00157                 strcParsedParameterDefinition()
00158                 {
00159                         sValue = "<undefined>";
00160                         bHasChanged = true;
00161                         bIsInitialized = true;
00162                 }       
00163                 QString sValue;          
00164                 bool bHasChanged;    
00165                 bool bIsInitialized; 
00166         };
00167
